_header: My death I love my life I hate for a lady sheen
_description: De Clerico et Puella — nine monorhyming quatrains

BLHar2253.First Lines:
My deþ Y loue my lyf Ich hate for a leuedy sheneHeo is brith
                    so daies liht þat is on me wel sene…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…Fader moder ant al my kun ne shal me holde so stilleÞat
                    Y nam þyn ant þou art myn to don al þi wille
